body.name: MEROKEETY Womens Winter Long Sleeve Button Sherpa Jacket Coat Pockets Warm Fleece
features: Size Guide: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=16. soft and fuzzy fabric, cozy relaxed fit, we accept 30 days money back!
Unique design: snap button down with stand-up collar, softest and warm sherpa fleece, casual loose fit, ribbed cuff/closure/hem, boyfriend style, great fleece coat for cold weather.

You will be surprised at how soft these fleece jackets are. Whether you're walking your dog, ice skating on the rink or just a casual walk, they would be the perfect jacket for this Autumn/Winter. You can wear it on cold mornings and nights.
Occasion: Casual, School, Christmas, Camping, Skiing, Family days, etc. Perfect for Winter, Autumn.
Garment Care: Machine wash cold, Hand wash recommended; Do Not Bleach / Hang or Line Dry.

Casual Coat Faux Shearling Fluffy Outwear Winter Long Sleeve Jacket This jacket is super cozy. I like to wear it either lounging around the house or for running errands.High quality, thick fleece jacket! Very cool gold snaps on the front and ribbed knit trim on the wrists and bottom hem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love these fleeces
reviews.reviewText: ANOTHER UPDATE: I LOVE these fleece jackets. I have bought a number of them and just bought three more. These are fleece lined and then sherpa faced on the outside --hence a double thickness of warmth. The snaps work well. The small fit me perfectly, at 5'3 and 120lbs. The colors are pretty much as shown. The snaps are substantial, the webbed hem and cuffs are really perfect and somewhat stretchy (I even fit the sleeve over my cast), and the neck buttons up nice and high for really fiercely cold day. I do have a little trouble getting some of my coats and jackets over these as they are of substantial thickness.THESE JACKETS/FLEECES ARE A LIFESAVER AS THEY HAVE ALLOWED ME TO SUBSTANTIALLY TO LOWER MY HEAT, EVEN ON REALLY COLD DAYS, TO ABOUT 62F. ONLY MY FEET GET COLD. BUT WE HAVE AN OIL FURNACE SO HAVE HAD A SUBSTANTIAL SAVINGS WITH OIL PRICES SO HIGH. IT IS NOT IN MY NATURE TO GIVE RAVE REVIEWS, BUT IN MY OPINION THIS PRODUCT DESERVES 5 STARS+++++.MY ORIGINAL REVIEW: I first bought two for myself to see about the fit and quality. The small fit me perfectly, with the little bit of looseness I like for a turtleneck or tee underneath. I'm 5'3 & 117 lbs. The length is good and the small size hits at my low hip, & the arms are just the right length. (My arms are longer than you'd predict from my size.) Thus, you can expect these to be true to size, & they certainly look MUCH better than they appear on the model. Why did they use those awful photos?The fleece is very thick, does not shed, and is a bit stretchy. I cannot believe how warm, -- oh so warm -- they are. The pockets are substantial; I can carry my big cell phone around in them. Be sure to keep them tucked as intended (from near the side seam & then toward the zipper) or they can make you look a bit thick around the girth -- not a big issue, though, as you simply need to adjust them when first putting the fleece on.The quality is very good. The snaps are substantial and go all the way up & down, allowing ANOTHER fleece to be worn in various styles, such as open, partly open, mostly closed, or turtle neck style. The ribbed front placket, pocket openings, & the cuffs are very nice: thick, well-sewn, & somewhat stretchy. The colors on my phone screen compared to the colors that arrived are very similar.I did not expect these to be as thick & lush as they are, so I do have some trouble fitting them under a few winter coats & jackets. This, however, would not stop me from buying more!I did not expect these to be such a good buy, BUT THEY ARE, so I bought quite a few others in different colors. The quality control & sizing remained the same. No worries about some being too big & others too small.I highly recommend these, especially if you live in cold climes or just like to lounge around in cooler weather in something really comfortable. A big thumbs up on these.UPDATE: I washed a few of these. They wash nicely on a permanent press cycle, and they dried without leaving lots of fluff in the dryer or on other clothing. Now I highly, highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Comfort and Style!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this lightweight jacket on my Wishlist for awhile and it finally came up on a Lightening Sale so I grabbed one. My cream colored jacket is as beautiful as advertised! Once I shook it out and fluffed it up in my dryer on low heat it was ready to wear. The Sherpa style is as seen, the interior is smooth without rough seams and it’s nice and warm. A lighter weight jacket for sure but I was warm and cozy in 50 degree weather. I really like that the sleeves are proportional, it seems that a lot of what I buy lately have really long, bulky sleeves. I’m 5’2” and 127 pounds and this jacket fits perfectly! I’m delighted with this purchase and I’m thinking of buying another one, there are lots of nice colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arms are a touch short
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’7” and ordered a medium. This is a great quality, warm, soft alternative to a winter jacket (think fall/ spring) but it’s not one I would wear to a football game or active outing. The arms are just a bit short and it’s not going to protect your waist if you need to bend over. I would’ve gotten a large to be a little more wearable over sweaters and such. Still happy with the purchase and wear it frequently for quick trips/ warmth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This super cute jacket is easy to wear, soft and heavy-sweater warm. The fit is perfect, sleeve length is just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend. Arrives exactly as pictured and described. Nice and warm and feels great. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's so huge and I got xs size.
reviews.reviewText: I specifically checked the size and buy xs. But still when I wear it is like M size.Other than that it is very fluffy and warm. Like wearing a carpet. XD

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loveeee this jacket!
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is so cozy and comfy I love it! I run warm but this jacket doesn’t over heat me or freeze me either ! It’s surprisingly warm in cold weather which is a bonus ! All around great purchase and my go to coat! I will say the sleeves are on the short side as some have said but I’m so short it’s not a problem for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very warm and nice appearance.
reviews.reviewText: My wife LOVED this jacket. Lightweight but very warm and easy to wear. The appearance is great also and everyone of her friends wants to try it on! Definite 5 star!!

I like this product, the fit is a little large for me, but it is very soft and cozy. I purchase it to stay on warm on my daily walks, so I will be keeping it and can layer underneath for extra warmth.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived earlier than promised and exceeded my expectations.
This looks like it was pulled out of a garbage dumster. And to add insult to injury it I have to pay to return this horrible garment. Do not buy from this seller!
